nodes.text: Tra's M'ins was a male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the final decades of the Galactic Republic.

A Force-sensitive, Tra's M'ins was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, eventually attaining the rank of Jedi Master. Master M'ins, through an extended period of individual study, became a noted diplomat for the Galactic Republic. Subject to receiving missions from the Council of Reconciliation, Master M'ins was dispatched to mediate the Duinuogwuin-Gotal conflict, a war sometime from 35 BBY to 33 BBY.

Accompanied by fellow Jedi Master Jorus C'baoth, M'ins' negotiation attempts were hijacked by the lower ranked C'Baoth. The Human Jedi hammered out an agreement between the Duinuogwuins and the Gotals, ending the conflict and gaining a powerful reputation amongst the Order.
